alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:54PM EDT until July 13 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Scioto County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 253 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Union, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... West Union, Rome, Blue Creek, Otway, Lombardsville, Dunkinsville, State Route 348 at State Route 125, Wamsley, Cedar Mills, Turkey Creek Lake and Bentonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
